lead_paragraph: Bar graphs and schoolroom animation are employed in a political action committee’s ad that proclaims “a vote for Kasich actually helps Trump.”

headline.print_headline: A Stop-Trump Message in Chalkboard Math
headline.main: Using Arithmetic to Unify the G.O.P. Against Donald Trump

snippet: Bar graphs and schoolroom animation are employed in a political action committee’s ad that proclaims “a vote for Kasich actually helps Trump.”
abstract: Latest ad by Club for Growth PAC endorses Republican candidate Ted Cruz and uses  school-age animation and condescending narrative to  pointedly attack Gov John Kasich and Donald J Trump; other advertisements in presidential race examined.
